telex.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a method of communication, in which messages are written on a special machine and then sent using the telephone network
telex.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a message sent in this way
telex.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a system of sending written messages from one business to another along telephone lines or by SATELLITE. This system has been widely replaced by FAX and E-MAIL
telex.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: a message sent in this way
telex.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: a telex from our Kenya office
telex.translation[2].definitions[0].defi: to send a message, piece of information etc to someone using a telex
